bibdata.title: Draft Guide for Testing Metal-Enclosed Switchgear Rated up to 38kV for Internal Arcing Faults
Corrigendum 1
Draft Guide for Testing Metal-Enclosed Switchgear Rated up to 38kV for Internal Arcing Faults - Corrigendum 1
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC37.20.7-2001 Cor 1/D3, Aug 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This corrigendum corrects technical errors found in the test guide during use in laboratories concerning current values and arc initiation in LV testing and supply frequency for all equipment.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.keyword: metal-enclosed low-voltage power circuit breaker switchgear
